caption:
well, I know that I'm just a fan for him but he is more that my life. I hope he have found people that make him really happy. if he is happy I'm too. I will be there for him even though he don't know me. I just don't want him to lose his beautiful smile. I'm so emotional rn. I hope he's doing great. I love him so much. and he is so important. fuck. I wish he was with me rn so I could run into his arms and cry, and talk to him about my fears and my problems. but yeah that's impossible:) I feel so safe in his arms but yeah idk. these days I'm so down. 
don't forget to smile:)
BEAU..I love you.. @beaub
